channel.title: Final Devo 2.4 Weapon damage
channel.description: Hey everyone. I want to know how to make my weapons consistently hit higher damage multipliers. They currently hit 20's and 30's and 44's every once in a while. I want to make them consistently hit 44's. I've edited all the weapons stats in item.cfg. They still won't consistently hit what I want it too. I'm using Final Devolution 2.4. Thanks.

item.title: Final Devo 2.4 Weapon damage
item.dc:creator: @Rat_racer550 Rat racer550
item.description:
@Rat_racer550 wrote:

is this it?

if (MAXHIT > 0 ) { if (MAXHIT >= 0) { if (playerIndex2.playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2550) { if (MAXHIT == 0) { recoilDamage = 0; } else if (MAXHIT >= 1 && MAXHIT <= 7) { recoilDamage = 1; } else if (MAXHIT >= 8 && MAXHIT <= 14) { recoilDamage = 2; } else if (MAXHIT >= 15 && MAXHIT <= 21) { recoilDamage = 3; } else if (MAXHIT >= 22 && MAXHIT <= 28) { recoilDamage = 5; } else if (MAXHIT >= 29 && MAXHIT <= 35) { recoilDamage = 6; } else if (MAXHIT > 35) { recoilDamage = 7; }

Read full topic

item.title: Final Devo 2.4 Weapon damage
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Rat racer550, post:7, topic:360052”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=456491.msg3341127#msg3341127 date=1284368797]

Post your hit calculation methods.

Where can I find them?

In your folder?

Lol, what folder though? Would they be in my client.java?

Cmon now…use your common sense. What would you do if you’re trying to find something? Just start searching through your files. There’s a search button in every text editor, so use it.
[/quote]
I used it bro:D. haha. nothing came up. I’ll check again.[/quote]

Find a weapon id, and just search that around until you find a method that looks like a max hit formula.

Read full topic
